name: Shadow Play (itch)
description:
INFO: ambient sound does not loop :(

Don't you hate it when ghosts from another dimension always try to CONNECT with you in the middle of the night for a scavenger hunt? So does Josie! Help her get through the graveyard and find the ghost's hideouts. But be careful, you're not the only ones playing there tonight...

HOW TO WIN
Avoid enemies and find all 3 locations to complete the game! (Hints below if you are stuck)

HOW TO PLAY
-Click/Hold left mouse button to move
-Mouse wheel for camera zoom
-A/D to turn the camera
-E for hints from the ghost
-Q to check if location is a hideout

Created for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4 (2019)
Artist:  Twitter @thenippaaah
Programmer: Itch.io @geist_191

Contact us if you want the sticker set!

Thank you for playing our game! 

DON'T READ PAST THIS IF YOU DON'T WANT SPOILERS
Lonely Grave Behind the Church
- Hill's End , Hidden Grave, Church Behind, Family's Disgrace

Bench next to the Lake past the Monument
- Water's Deep, Traveler's Halt, Sit!, Fish Place

Behind Crypt with "No Escape" written on it (Right of the  Monument)
- Last Words, No Escape, Wealthy Rest, Eternal Sleep

Black Flower right after the Entrance to the Graveyard
- Dark Rose, Blooming Triad, Cross Trinity, Surrounded Beauty

Church on top of the Hill (Right of the Monument)
- Holy House, Hill Top, Sacred Player, Kind Refuge

Monument (Follow the Stone Path to the Center)
- Forgotten Memory, Central Structure, Past Remembers, Old Tribute

Pink Mushroom! (Right of the Entrance to the Graveyard)
- Not Blue, Pink Glow, Special Shroom, Faerie Circle

Ancient Tree (Left of the Monument)
- Oldest Being, Wise Oak, Lonely Tree, Dead Giant

Shrine (Right of the Church)
- Shrine Above, Last Memory, Cursed Altar, Forsaken Prayer
